sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <campaigns/> <description>Each time the character gains a rank of Deadly Accuracy, he must choose one combat skill. The character may add his basic training ranks in that combat skill as additional damage to one hit of a successful attack made with that skill with non-starship/vehicle weapons. He cannot choose the same combat skill twice.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Deadly Accuracy</name> <number>TAL0001170</number> <passive_or_active>passive</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-10-13 19:51:44</sys_created_on> <sys_id>0a29e89a2fbfd090e0f497eef699b600</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-10-13 19:51:44</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
